name: Raised Networks Inc.
description: Raised is a marketplace of senior business on-demand professionals in Sales, Growth, Marketing, Product and CS with experience at Tier-1 startups and scaleups like Miro, Revolut, Pinterest, Grammarly, Tinder or Coinbase. Our experts work directly with founding teams to accelerate growth, get a higher valuation and solve the toughest challenges of their startups.
one_liner: Raised is a marketplace of senior business on-demand professionals in Sales, Growth, Marketing, Product and CS with experience at Tier-1 startups and scaleups like Miro, Revolut, Pinterest, Grammarly, Tinder or Coinbase. Our experts work directly with founding teams to accelerate growth, get a higher valuation and solve the toughest challenges of their startups.
